CustomField.formula: IF($Organization.Id = '00D3H0000000ivA',"https://aspect.co.uk","https://aspect.co.uk.hyv.gotest.it")& "/forms/confirm-your-booking/?id="& Id & "&job="& Name & "&acc="& Account__r.Account_Reference__c & "&nam="&SUBSTITUTE( Account__r.Name , " ", "%20")& "&wo="&Earliest_Work_Order_by_Requested_Date__c& "&l4d="& RIGHT( Authorisation__r.asp04__Account_Reference__c , 4) & "&f1="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(Card_on_Record_Start__c ),8)) & "&f2="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(Card_on_Record_Start__c /8),8)) & "&f3="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(Card_on_Record_Start__c /(8*8)),8)) & "&f4="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(Card_on_Record_Start__c /(8*8*8)),8)) & "&f5="& TEXT(MOD( FLOOR(Card_on_Record_Start__c /(8*8*8*8)),8))
